main event: Witnesses reported multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects in British Columbia, Canada in February 1960, including a bright circular object and a rapidly moving light.
interesting points: The first sighting on February 6, 1960, involved a reddish-orange circular object observed for approximately 5 minutes,The second sighting on February 23, 1960, had two observers witnessing a bright light travelling erratically for about 30 minutes,The objects observed made no sound and displayed remarkable flight characteristics,The sightings were reported to various agencies including the RCMP and the Canadian Navy,Considerable investigation was conducted based on witness accounts and ongoing reports of strange aerial phenomena in the region.
sighted object: Unidentified flying objects including a bright circular object and a rapidly moving light
witness description: Two observers saw a bright light travelling erratically in the sky.
